snippet.title: Fairy Tail 2 - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Fairy Tail 2 is a tactical RPG hack-and-slash developed by Koei Tecmo. Marking the game's epic climactic finale, Fairy Tail 2 is packed with feature full appearances by Spriggan 12 and Zeref, magical battles, an original storyline, and more. Fairy Tail 2 is coming this winter to PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#FairyTail2 #IGN #Gaming
